tweet: KIPPRA today conducted an induction workshop for the newly recruited cohort of Young Professionals. The young professionals will undergo an intensive one-year training programme on evidence-based policy process and economic tools of analysis among other areas of training.

A team of KIPPRA staff today participated in #StanChartNairobiMarathon as part of the institute's corporate social responsibility. The team participated in 5km, 10km and 21km races whose proceeds will go to Standard Chartered's the future makers programmes #KIPPRAat25
